prompts: Create a legendary Pokemon that embodies the spirit of a noble wolf.
Imagine a mythical creature with a powerful blue aura and a majestic sword.
Design a Pokemon that thrives in lush forests and has a fierce demeanor.
Generate a combat-ready Pokemon that showcases the elegance of a warrior.
Show me a Pokemon with striking blue fur and a regal appearance.
Make a Pokemon that balances grace and strength, perfect for epic battles.
Give me a visual of a majestic canine Pokemon with a unique weapon.
